## Introduction

This course introduces STATA for statistical computing. Students learn data entry, manipulation, and basic visualization.

* Lecture 7: Graphical Presentation 2

* Lecture 9: Summarization of data 2
* Lecture 10: Statistical tests
* Lecture 11: Statistical modeling
* Lecture 12: Project and Research Paper Analysis
